N-Back Task.Description: The N-Back Task measures working memory ability - these data are for the condition 0-back

ExperimentName.Description: Name of the experiment used to generate the data file

DataFile.Basename.Description: Name of data output from E-prime

ExperimentVersion.Description: Version of the task used to generate the data file

GetReady.DEVICE[Session].Description: Device enabled to accept input from during session/task Get Ready screen

Group.Description: Group number. As part of this experiment, no Group is assigned at runtime, so defaults to 1

Instructions.DEVICE[Session].Description: Device enabled to accept input from during Instructions screen

RandomSeed.Description: Auto-generated random seed used for randomization

RuntimeVersion.Description: E-run version used to run experiment

RuntimeVersionExpected.Description: E-run version expected to run experiment

SessionDate.Description: Date of experiment; based on the computer

SessionStartDateTimeUtc.Description: Date and time of experiment in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

SessionTime.Description: Time of task based on the computer

BreakText.DEVICE.Description: Device enabled to accept input from during break text

GetReady.DEVICE[Block].Description: Device enabled to accept input from during block Get Ready screen

List1.Description: ID of list1 procedure being run. Will be equal to list1_sample because list1 procedure orders were not randomized

Levels.1: ID 1, corresponds to B0BlockProc( block 1 of nback task)
Levels.2: ID 2, corresponds to Break (break screen option)
Levels.3: ID 3, corresponds to GetReadyProc (get ready screen)
Levels.5: ID 5, corresponds to B0Block2Proc (block 2 of nback task)

List1.Cycle.Description: Cycle number of list1 (which contains B0BlockProc, Break, GetReadyProc, FocusProc, B0Block2Proc). Task was programmed to have 1 cycle

Levels.List1: A list that contains 5 procedure blocks (B0BlockProc, Break, GetReadyProc, FocusProc, B0Block2Proc)

Trial.Description: Stimulus number being presented from the corresponding procedure_block (range: 1-30)

B0List1.Description: ID of stimulus (letter) being presented from b0_list1. Will be equal to b0_list1_sample since stimulus order was not randomized

B0List1.Cylce.Description: Cycle number for the first block of the task. Task was programmed for 1 cycle

B0List1.Sample.Description: Order stimulus (letter) was presented within Block 1 (range: 1-30). For example, 1 = first letter presented, 5 = fifth letter presented.

B0List2.Description: ID of stimulus (letter) being presented from b0_list2. Will be equal to b0_list2_sample since trial order was not randomized

B0List2.Cylce.Description: Cycle number for the second block of the task. Task was programmed for 1 cycle

B0List2.Sample.Description: Order stimulus (letter) was presented within Block 2 (range: 1-30). For example, 1 = first letter presented, 5 = fifth letter presented.

B0Stim.Description: Stimulus letter presented for each trial

B0Stim.ACC.Description: Accuracy of participant response for target (!) trials. Does not reflect overall accuracy!

Levels.0: indicates no response was made for a target letter (an incorrect response) OR no response was made for a fill letter (correct response)
Levels.1: correct response (indicates {SPACE} hit for target letter)

B0Stim.CRESP.Description: Correct response for the each trial

B0Stim.DEVICE.Description: Device enabled to accept input from during stimulus presentation

B0Stim.DurationError.Description: Difference in stimuli duration and the intended duration - when the event is terminated by a response, a value of - 99999 is used (i.e., since the duration error cannot be computed in that sutation)

B0Stim.OnsetDelay.Description: Time from stimuli onset time and the expected/target onset time

B0Stim.OnsetTime.Description: Time from start of task to stimuli presentation

B0Stim.OnsetToOnsetTime.Description: Time from the current trial and the next trial's stimulis OnsetTime

B0Stim.RESP.Description: Response to stimuli for each trial

B0Stim.RT.Description: Response time to stimuli for each trial

B0Stim.RTTime.Description: Time from start of task to response for each trial

Condition.Description: Condition type of the presented stimulus

Levels.Fill: The presented stimulus does not meet the criteria for 0-Back response (i.e., not 'X')
Levels.Target: The presented stimulus meets the criteria for a 0-Back response (i.e., 'X')
Levels: The presented stimulus is not a letter

Correct.Description: Correct response for the each trial

Running[Trial].Description: Name of list of corresponding to procedure trail

Levels.B0List1: List containing stimuli for first block
Levels.B0List2: List containing stimuli for second block
